content: lion brand pattern # 70254ad skill level easy level 2 vanna s choice® article #860 15 colors 1 ball each *brick rust honey beige mustard pea green dusty green olive navy colonial blue dusty blue purple dusty purple antique rose chocolate* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 1 granny square = 6 x 6 in 15 x 15 cm special stitch popcorn make 3 different pattern motifs of each color sequence 16 versions provided 48 squares total sew motifs together following assembly diagram 1 http //www joann com/granny-sampler-throw/p181384 html
